member.name: CERT_OR_CRL_BUNDLE
member.summary: The CERT_OR_CRL_BUNDLE structure encapsulates an array of certificates for use with Internet Key Exchange messages.

member.name: CERT_OR_CRL_BUNDLE.cItem
member.summary: The number of items in the array pointed to by the rgItem member.

member.name: CERT_OR_CRL_BUNDLE.rgItem
member.summary: A pointer to an array of certificates.
